data.lyric:
[ti:See You Again (第58届格莱美提名歌曲|《速度与激情7》电影片尾曲)]
[ar:Wiz Khalifa/Charlie Puth]
[al:Furious 7 (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]See You Again (feat. Charlie Puth) (当我们再相见) - Wiz Khalifa (维兹·卡利法)/Charlie Puth (查理·普斯)
[00:02.27]Lyrics by：Justin Franks/Charlie Puth/Wiz Khalifa/Sage the Gemini
[00:04.54]Composed by：Justin Franks/Charlie Puth/Wiz Khalifa/Sage the Gemini
[00:06.81]Produced by：DJ Frank E/Charlie Puth/Andrew Cedar
[00:09.09]Charlie Puth：
[00:10.99]It's been a long day without you my friend
[00:17.71]And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[00:23.57]We've come a long way from where we began
[00:29.33]Oh I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[00:35.34]When I see you again
[00:39.17]Wiz Khalifa：
[00:40.27]D**n who knew
[00:41.70]All the planes we flew
[00:43.28]Good things we been through
[00:45.08]That I'd be standing right here talking to you
[00:47.77]'Bout another path
[00:49.11]I know we loved to hit the road and laugh
[00:51.40]But something told me that it wouldn't last
[00:53.80]Had to switch up look at things different see the bigger picture
[00:57.57]Those were the days hard work forever pays
[01:00.64]Now I see you in a better place
[01:02.45]See you in a better place
[01:04.22]Uh
[01:05.33]How could we not talk about family when family's all that we got
[01:08.94]Everything I went through
[01:10.11]You were standing there by my side
[01:11.95]And now you gon' be with me for the last ride
[01:14.03]Charlie Puth/Wiz Khalifa：
[01:14.20]It's been a long day without you my friend
[01:20.61]And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[01:25.66]I'll see you again
[01:26.54]We've come a long way
[01:28.81]Yeah we came a long way
[01:29.90]From where we began
[01:31.92]You know we started
[01:32.50]Oh
[01:32.74]I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[01:37.92]I'll tell you
[01:38.47]When I see you again
[01:40.95]Charlie Puth：
[01:41.52]Aah oh aah oh
[01:47.44]Wooooh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[01:52.62]Yeah
[01:54.25]Wiz Khalifa：
[01:56.59]First you both go out your way and the vibe is feeling strong
[01:59.57]And what's small turned to a friendship
[02:01.29]A friendship turned to a bond
[02:02.60]And that bond will never be broken
[02:04.24]The love will never get lost
[02:05.87]The love will never get lost
[02:08.68]And when brotherhood come first
[02:10.14]Then the line will never be crossed
[02:11.68]Established it on our own when that line had to be drawn
[02:14.61]And that line is what we reached so remember me when I'm gone
[02:18.01]Remember me when I'm gone
[02:19.58]Wiz Khalifa：
[02:20.42]How could we not talk about family when family's all that we got
[02:23.90]Everything I went through you were standing there by my side
[02:26.92]And now you gon' be with me for the last ride
[02:29.09]Charlie Puth：
[02:29.24]So let the light guide your way yeah
[02:36.37]Hold every memory as you go
[02:41.51]And every road you take
[02:44.88]Will always lead you home home
[02:52.96]It's been a long day without you my friend
[02:59.64]And I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[03:05.51]We've come a long way from where we began
[03:11.32]Oh I'll tell you all about it when I see you again
[03:17.33]When I see you again
[03:20.06]Charlie Puth/Wiz Khalifa：
[03:20.47]Aah oh aah oh
[03:22.94]Uh
[03:25.53]Yeah
[03:25.65]Yeah
[03:26.42]Wooooh-oh-oh-oh-oh-oh
[03:28.58]Yo
[03:29.40]When I see you again
[03:31.04]Yo uh
[03:32.01]See you again
[03:34.41]Yo yo
[03:37.29]Oh-oh
[03:39.62]Uh-huh
[03:41.33]Yup
[03:41.47]When I see you again
data.trans:
[ti:See You Again (第58届格莱美提名歌曲|《速度与激情7》电影片尾曲)]
[ar:Wiz Khalifa/Charlie Puth]
[al:Furious 7 (Original Motion Picture Soundtrack)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]腾讯音乐享有本翻译作品的著作权
[00:02.27]//
[00:04.54]//
[00:06.81]//
[00:09.09]//
[00:10.99]没有老友你的陪伴 日子真是漫长
[00:17.71]与你重逢之时 我会敞开心扉倾诉所有
[00:23.57]回头凝望 我们携手走过漫长的旅程
[00:29.33]与你重逢之时 我会敞开心扉倾诉所有
[00:35.34]与你重逢之时
[00:39.17]//
[00:40.27]谁会了解
[00:41.70]我们经历过怎样的旅程
[00:43.28]我们见证过怎样的美好
[00:45.08]这便是我在你眼前出现的原因
[00:47.77]与你聊聊另一种选择的可能
[00:49.11]我懂我们都偏爱速度与激情
[00:51.40]但有个声音告诉我这美好并不会永恒
[00:53.80]我们得变更视野 转向更为辽阔的天地
[00:57.57]有付出的日子终有收获的时节
[01:00.64]此刻 我看到你走进更加美好的未来
[01:02.45]我看到你走进更加美好的未来
[01:04.22]//
[01:05.33]当家人已是我们唯一的牵绊 我们怎么能忘却最可贵的真情
[01:08.94]无论历经怎样的艰难坎坷
[01:10.11]总有你相伴陪我度过
[01:11.95]最后一段征程 我更需要你的相伴
[01:14.03]//
[01:14.20]没有老友你的陪伴 日子真是漫长
[01:20.61]与你重逢之时 我会敞开心扉倾诉所有
[01:25.66]我会与你再次重逢
[01:26.54]我们携手走过漫长的旅程
[01:28.81]我们携手走过漫长的旅程
[01:29.90]从我们最初的起点
[01:31.92]你知道我们已启程
[01:32.50]//
[01:32.74]与你重逢之时 我会敞开心扉倾诉所有
[01:37.92]我会敞开心扉倾诉所有
[01:38.47]与你重逢之时
[01:40.95]//
[01:41.52]//
[01:47.44]//
[01:52.62]//
[01:54.25]//
[01:56.59]一开始你们总是追随你们心中的步伐
[01:59.57]热忱累积 信念不变
[02:01.29]渺小的世界见证这段深情厚谊
[02:02.60]深厚的友情蜕成血浓于水的感情
[02:04.24]此情不变 
[02:05.87]此爱难逝
[02:08.68]莫逆之交的我们 绝不会背叛彼此
[02:10.14]只因这深情厚谊基于我们真实意愿
[02:11.68]这友谊让我们肝胆相照 荣辱与共
[02:14.61]即便我离去 也请将我铭记
[02:18.01]即便我离去 也请将我铭记
[02:19.58]//
[02:20.42]当家人已是我们唯一的牵绊 我们怎么能忘却最可贵的真情
[02:23.90]无论历经怎样的艰难坎坷  总有你相伴陪我度过
[02:26.92]最后一段征程 我更需要你的相伴
[02:29.09]//
[02:29.24]就让那光芒引导你的前路 铭记与我的曾经
[02:36.37]铭记与我的曾经
[02:41.51]无论你选哪一条路 
[02:44.88]那都会通向你的家
[02:52.96]没有老友你的陪伴 日子真是漫长
[02:59.64]与你重逢之时 我会敞开心扉倾诉所有
[03:05.51]回头凝望 我们携手走过漫长的旅程
[03:11.32]与你重逢之时 我会敞开心扉倾诉所有
[03:17.33]与你重逢之时
[03:20.06]//
[03:20.47]//
[03:22.94]//
[03:25.53]//
[03:25.65]//
[03:26.42]//
[03:28.58]//
[03:29.40]与你重逢之时
[03:31.04]//
[03:32.01]与你重逢之时
[03:34.41]//
[03:37.29]//
[03:39.62]//
[03:41.33]//
[03:41.47]与你重逢之时
